overview: At a village railway station in occupied Czechoslovakia, a bumbling dispatcher’s apprentice longs to liberate himself from his virginity. Oblivious to the war and the resistance that surrounds him, this young man embarks on a journey of sexual awakening and self-discovery, encountering a universe of frustration, eroticism, and adventure within his sleepy backwater depot.
tagline: All it takes to make a man of a boy is a woman.
cast: Václav Neckář|Jitka Scoffin|Vladimír Valenta|Libuše Havelková|Josef Somr
